00035 /*  No constructor and destructor, because this class only contains static methods.
00036         It won't be instantiated. */

00038 const QString CBTConfig::getKey( const CBTConfig::strings ID){
00039     switch ( ID ){
00040         case bibletimeVersion:          return "bibletimeVersion";
00041         case language:                          return "language";
00042         case standardBible:                 return "standardBible";
00043         case standardCommentary:        return "standardCommentary";
00044         case standardLexicon:           return "standardLexicon";
00045         case standardHebrewStrongsLexicon:  return "standardHebrewLexicon";
00046         case standardGreekStrongsLexicon:   return "standardGreekLexicon";
00047         case standardHebrewMorphLexicon:    return "standardHebrewMorphLexicon";
00048         case standardGreekMorphLexicon:     return "standardGreekMorphLexicon";
00049     }
00050     return QString::null;
00051 }
00052 
00053 const QString CBTConfig::getDefault( const CBTConfig::strings ID){
00054     switch ( ID ){
00055         case bibletimeVersion:          return ( "NOT YET INSTALLED" );
00056             // main() will realize this and set the value to VERSION
00057         case language:                          return (KGlobal::locale()->language()).local8Bit();
00058         case standardBible:                 return "KJV";  // no effect
00059         case standardCommentary:        return "MHC";
00060         case standardLexicon:           return "Eastons";
00061         case standardHebrewStrongsLexicon: return "StrongsHebrew";
00062         case standardGreekStrongsLexicon:   return "StrongsGreek";
00063         case standardHebrewMorphLexicon:    return "StrongsHebrew"; //warning this is wrong
00064         case standardGreekMorphLexicon:     return "StrongsGreek";  //but imo has no effect
00065     }
00066     return QString::null;
00067 }
00068 
00069 const QString CBTConfig::getKey( const CBTConfig::fonts ID){
00070     switch ( ID ){
00071         case standard:  return "standard";
00072         case unicode:   return "unicode";
00073     }
00074     return QString::null;   
00075 }

00077 const QFont CBTConfig::getDefault( const CBTConfig::fonts ID){
00078     switch ( ID ){
00079         case standard:  return QApplication::font();
00080         case unicode: //find an Unicode font
00081         {   
00082 //          KCharsets* cs = KGlobal::charsets();
00083 //          QFontDatabase db;
00084 //          QFont uniFont;
00085 //          if (!cs->isAvailable(QFont::Unicode)) { //no unicode font installed!
00086 //              qWarning("NO UNICODE FONT INSTALLED!");
00087 //          }           
00088 //          cs->setQFont(uniFont, QFont::Unicode);
00090 //          
00131 //          
00141 #warning reimplement -> maybe using QFontDatabase::script ?
00142             return QApplication::font();
00143         }
00144         
00145     }
00146     return QString::null;   
00147 }

00149 const QString CBTConfig::getKey( const CBTConfig::bools ID){
00150     switch ( ID ){
00151         case firstSearchDialog:     return "firstSearchDialog";
00152 
00153         case toolbar:                           return "toolbar";
00154         case mainIndex:                     return "mainIndex";
00155 
00156         case autoTile:                      return "autoTile";
00157         case autoCascade:                   return "autoCascade";
00158 
00159         case lexiconCache:              return "lexicon_chache";
00160 
00161         case footnotes:                     return "footnotes";
00162         case strongNumbers:             return "strongNumbers";
00163     case headings:                      return "headings";
00164     case morphTags:                     return "morphTags";
00165         case lemmas:                            return "lemmas";
00166         case hebrewPoints:              return "hebrewPoints";
00167         case hebrewCantillation:    return "hebrewCantillation";
00168         case greekAccents:              return "greekAccents";
00169         case textualVariants:           return "textualVariants";       
00170 
00171         case lineBreaks:                    return "lineBreaks";
00172         case verseNumbers:              return "verseNumbers";
00173         case scroll:                            return "scroll";
00174 
00175         case tips:                              return "RunOnStart";
00176         case logo:                              return "logo";
00177         case restoreWorkspace:      return "restoreWorkspace";
00178     }
00179     return QString::null;   
00180 }

00182 const bool CBTConfig::getDefault( const CBTConfig::bools ID){
00183     switch ( ID ){
00184         case firstSearchDialog:     return true;
00185 
00186         case toolbar:                           return true;
00187         case mainIndex:                     return true;
00188 
00189         case autoTile:                      return true;
00190         case autoCascade:                   return false;
00191 
00192         case lexiconCache:              return true;
00193 
00194         case footnotes:                     return true;
00195         case strongNumbers:             return false;
00196     case headings:                      return true;
00197     case morphTags:                     return false;
00198         case lemmas:                            return false;
00199         case hebrewPoints:              return false;
00200         case hebrewCantillation:    return false;
00201         case greekAccents:              return false;
00202         case textualVariants:           return false;
00203 
00204         case lineBreaks:                    return true;
00205         case verseNumbers:              return true;
00206         case scroll:                            return true;
00207 
00208         case tips:                              return true;
00209         case logo:                              return true;
00210         case restoreWorkspace:      return false;
00211     }
00212     return false;
00213 }

00215 const QString CBTConfig::getKey( const CBTConfig::colors ID){
00216     switch ( ID ){
00217         case textColor:                             return "textColor";
00218         case backgroundColor:               return "backgroundColor";
00219         case highlightedVerseColor:     return "highlightedVerseClolor";
00220         case footnotesColor:                    return "footnotesColor";
00221         case strongsColor:                      return "strongsColor";
00222         case morphsColor:                       return "morphsColor";
00223         case jesuswordsColor:               return "jesuswordsColor";
00224         case swordRefColor:                     return "swordRefColor";
00225     }
00226     return QString::null;
00227 }

00229 const QColor CBTConfig::getDefault( const CBTConfig::colors ID){
00230     switch ( ID ){
00231         case textColor:                             return QColor(Qt::black);
00232         case backgroundColor:               return QColor(Qt::white);
00233         case highlightedVerseColor:     return QColor(Qt::red);
00234         case footnotesColor:                    return QColor(Qt::black);
00235         case strongsColor:                      return QColor(Qt::green);
00236         case morphsColor:                       return QColor(Qt::green);
00237         case jesuswordsColor:               return QColor(Qt::red);
00238         case swordRefColor:                     return QColor(Qt::blue);
00239     }
00240     return Qt::blue;
00241 }

00257 const QString CBTConfig::getKey( const CBTConfig::stringLists ID){
00258     switch ( ID ){
00259         case searchCompletionTexts: return QString::fromLatin1("searchCompletionTexts");
00260         case searchTexts: return QString::fromLatin1("searchTexts");
00261     }
00262     return QString::null;

00265 const QStringList CBTConfig::getDefault( const CBTConfig::stringLists ID){
00266     switch ( ID ){
00267         case searchTexts:
00268             return QStringList();
00269         case searchCompletionTexts:
00270             return QStringList();
00271     }
00272     return QStringList();

00275 const QString CBTConfig::get( const CBTConfig::strings ID){
00276     KConfig* config = KGlobal::config();
00277     KConfigGroupSaver groupSaver(config, "strings");
00278     return config->readEntry(getKey(ID),getDefault(ID));
00279 }
00280 
00281 const QFont CBTConfig::get(const CBTConfig::fonts ID){
00282     KConfig* config = KGlobal::config();
00283     KConfigGroupSaver groupSaver(config, "fonts");
00284     QFont defaultFont = getDefault(ID);
00285     return config->readFontEntry(getKey(ID), &defaultFont);
00286 }
00287 
00288 const bool CBTConfig::get( const CBTConfig::bools ID){
00289     //special behaviour for the KTipDialog class
00290     KConfig* config = KGlobal::config();    
00291     KConfigGroupSaver groupSaver(config, (ID == CBTConfig::tips) ? "TipOfDay" : "bools");       
00292     return config->readBoolEntry(getKey(ID),getDefault(ID));
00293 }
00294 
00295 const QColor CBTConfig::get( const CBTConfig::colors ID){
00296     KConfig* config = KGlobal::config();
00297     KConfigGroupSaver groupSaver(config, "colors");
00298     QColor defaultColor = getDefault(ID);
00299     return config->readColorEntry(getKey(ID),&defaultColor);
00300 }

00303     KConfig* config = KGlobal::config();
00304     KConfigGroupSaver groupSaver(config, "lists");
00305     return config->readIntListEntry(getKey(ID));

00314 void CBTConfig::set( const CBTConfig::strings ID, const QString value ){
00315     KConfig* config = KGlobal::config();
00316     KConfigGroupSaver groupSaver(config, "strings");
00317     config->writeEntry(getKey(ID), value);

00326 void CBTConfig::set(const  CBTConfig::bools ID,const  bool value ){
00327     KConfig* config = KGlobal::config();
00328     //special behaviour to work with KTipDialog class of KDE
00329     KConfigGroupSaver groupSaver(config, (ID == CBTConfig::tips) ? "TipOfDay" : "bools");
00330     config->writeEntry(getKey(ID), value);
00331 }

00353 const CSwordBackend::DisplayOptionsBool CBTConfig::getDisplayOptionDefaults(){
00354   CSwordBackend::DisplayOptionsBool options;
00355 
00356     options.lineBreaks =        get(CBTConfig::lineBreaks);
00357   options.verseNumbers =    get(CBTConfig::verseNumbers);
00358 
00359     return options;
00360 }

00362 const CSwordBackend::FilterOptionsBool CBTConfig::getFilterOptionDefaults(){
00363 
00364   CSwordBackend::FilterOptionsBool options;
00365 
00366   options.footnotes =                       get(CBTConfig::footnotes);
00367   options.strongNumbers =           get(CBTConfig::strongNumbers);
00368   options.headings =                        get(CBTConfig::headings);
00369   options.morphTags =                   get(CBTConfig::morphTags);
00370   options.lemmas =                          get(CBTConfig::lemmas);
00371   options.hebrewPoints =                get(CBTConfig::hebrewPoints);
00372   options.hebrewCantillation =  get(CBTConfig::hebrewCantillation);
00373   options.greekAccents =                get(CBTConfig::greekAccents);
00374 
00375     return options;
00376 }
00377 
00378 void CBTConfig::setupAccel(const CBTConfig::keys type, KAccel* const accel) {
00379     KConfig* config = KGlobal::config();    
00380     
00381     switch (type) {
00382         case readWindow : {
00383             accel->setConfigGroup("Readwindow shortcuts");      
00384             break;
00385         };
00386         case bookWindow : {
00387             accel->setConfigGroup("Book shortcuts");        
00388             break;
00389         };
00390         case bibleWindow : {
00391             accel->setConfigGroup("Bible shortcuts");
00392             break;
00393         };
00394         case commentaryWindow : {
00395             accel->setConfigGroup("Commentary shortcuts");              
00396             break;      
00397         };
00398         case lexiconWindow : {
00399             accel->setConfigGroup("Lexicon shortcuts");                 
00400             break;
00401         };
00402         case application : {
00403             accel->setConfigGroup("Application shortcuts");             
00404             break;
00405         };
00406     };
00407 }
